word.def: The occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way.
word.example: Finding a $20 bill on the street was pure serendipity.

quote.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

fact.text: The human brain contains approximately 86 billion neurons.
fact.more: This vast network allows us to think, feel, and create complex ideas.
